Package it.polimi.ingsw.observer

Interface ViewObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientManager
public interface ViewObserver
Custom observer interface for views. It supports different types of notification.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void activeLeader​(int index)
    Send a message to active a leader card.
    void addPlayerLobby()
    Send a message to add himself to the lobby.
    void endTurn()
    Send a message to end the turn.

  • Method Details

    • ServerInfo

      void ServerInfo​(java.lang.String address, java.lang.String port)
      Create a new connection to the server with the updated info.
      Parameters:
      address - of the server.
      port - of the server.

    • Nickname

      void Nickname​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Sends a message to the server with the updated nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname to be sent.

    • PlayersNumber

      void PlayersNumber​(int playersNumber)
      Sends a message to the server with the player number chosen by the user.
      Parameters:
      playersNumber - the number of players.

    • firstAction

      void firstAction​(int index1, int index2)
      Send a message to the server with the two leader card to discard
      Parameters:
      index1 - for the first card
      index2 - for the second card

    • secondAction

      void secondAction​(java.util.ArrayList<Resources> resources)
      Send a message to the server with the resources you want to get for not been first in turn
      Parameters:
      resources - for the array list of the resources

    • getMarket

      void getMarket​(int choice, int index)
      Send a message to the server with the parameter of the market
      Parameters:
      choice - to choose between row or column
      index - for the index

    • sortingMarket

      void sortingMarket​(Resources choice, int row, int index)
      Send a message for sort the resources obtained from the market
      Parameters:
      choice - for the resource to sort
      row - for the index of the row in the warehouse
      index - for the index of the resource in the temporary storage

    • switchRows

      void switchRows​(int row1, int row2)
      Send a message for switch rows in the warehouse
      Parameters:
      row1 - for the first row
      row2 - for the second row

    • moveBetweenWarehouses

      void moveBetweenWarehouses​(Resources resources, int position, int newPosition)
      Send a message to move a resource in the warehouse
      Parameters:
      resources - for the type of resource
      position - for the old position
      newPosition - for the new position

    • getProduction

      void getProduction​(int color, int level, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> pos, int index, int[] a)
      Send a message to the server for getting a Development Card
      Parameters:
      color - for the card color
      level - for the card level
      pos - for the position of the resources (Warehouse, Strongbox or Special Warehouse)
      index - for the index of space production where to put the card
      a - for the actual card cost

    • useBaseProduction

      void useBaseProduction​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> value, java.util.ArrayList<Resources> pass, Resources obtain)
      Send a message to the server to active the Base production
      Parameters:
      value - for the list of the position of the resources used to pay (Warehouse, Strongbox, Special Warehouse)
      pass - for the list of the Resources used to pay
      obtain - for the resource obtained

    • useNormalProduction

      void useNormalProduction​(int index, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> pos, int[] a)
      Send a message to the server for activating the production of a card
      Parameters:
      index - for the Space production index of the card
      pos - for the position of the resources used to pay
      a - for the actual production cost

    • useSpecialProduction

      void useSpecialProduction​(int index, int choice, Resources resource, Resources res)
      Send a message for activating the special production
      Parameters:
      index - for the index of the leader card
      choice - for the position of the resource used to pay
      resource - for the resource to get
      res - for the resource used to pay

    • activeLeader

      void activeLeader​(int index)
      Send a message to active a leader card.
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the leader card.

    • addPlayerLobby

      void addPlayerLobby()
      Send a message to add himself to the lobby.

    • foldLeader

      void foldLeader​(int index)
      Send a message to fold a leader card.
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the leader card.

    • endTurn

      void endTurn()
      Send a message to end the turn.

    • onDisconnect

      void onDisconnect()
      Handle on disconnection.
